price: Dubartootaaf mahriiwwan isaanii kenna jaalalaan ta'e kennaafii. Yoo isaan jaalala lubbuu isaaniitiin isa irraa isiniif kennan, halaala gaarii haala ta'een isa nyaadhaa.
arabic: وَءَاتُواْ ٱلنِّسَآءَ صَدُقَٰتِهِنَّ نِحۡلَةٗۚ فَإِن طِبۡنَ لَكُمۡ عَن شَيۡءٖ مِّنۡهُ نَفۡسٗا فَكُلُوهُ هَنِيٓـٔٗا مَّرِيٓـٔٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waātū al-nisāa ṣaduqātihinna niḥ'latan fa-in ṭib'na lakum ʿan shayin min'hu nafsan fakulūhu hanīan marīan
